About Me

def main():
I = boy('Wang Hongbo')
# On the night of Nov 27th, 1990, I was born.
I.born = "19901127|Henan|China"
# Sep 1st, 2009, I was admitted to Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
I.undergraduteUniversity = HUST
# After 4 years, I got the postgradute recommendation to Institue of Computing Technology of
# Chinese Academy of Sciences.
I.graduateUniversity = ICT.CAS
# About Me
I.email = wanghongbo@ict.ac.cn
I.github = http://github.com/kingmacrobo
I.linkedin = http://cn.linkedin.com/pub/hongbo-wang
I.csdn = http://blog.csdn.net/u013101828
I.weibo = http://weibo.com/mbkg
I.interests = Fitness｜Basketball|Swimming|Reading|Programming|Algorithms
I.skills = C++|C|Python|Objective-C|MySQL|IOS|Linux Porting|Parallel Computing
# Finally, I found this place to record my life and what I learn in every single day.
# Live, love and Laugh!
while True:
I.Effort += 1

if __name__ == '__main__':
main()
